alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:48PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 330 PM MST... At 248 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Tonto Basin, or 11 miles north of Roosevelt, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt Dam, Four Peaks, Punkin Center and Tonto Basin. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 214 and 215. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 245 and 262. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
